title-group.article-title: Negotiating the Music-Theory/African-Music Nexus: A Political Critique of Ethnomusicological Anti-Formalism and a Strategic Analysis of the Harmonic Patterning of the Shona Mbira Song Nyamaropa

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2001 Perspectives of New Music, Inc.
